item.title: Data Analysis with R (I) - Introductory Level
item.description: Topics/slides Intro & first steps R Objects creation and manipulation Logical operators and control statements Base R graphics Read, manipulate and write data Final assignment (not available)

item.title: Data Analysis with R (II) - Intermediary Level
item.description: Topics/slides Review and functions Loops Apply family Intro to Tidyverse, strings and REGEX manipulation with stringr Dates with lubridate Data wrangling with dplyr Two table verbs in dplyr Accessing SQL databases with dbplyr Graphics with ggplot2
